entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Windy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Rain or snow. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
